sentence.Network_en: Ancestral Awakening and Improved Water Shield will now affect Riptide.
sentence.Network_cn: 先祖觉醒和强化水盾对激流生效了.

sentence.Network_en: If you find yourself in a riptide, don't panic.
sentence.Network_cn: 假如你发现自己被卷入激潮时, 别惊慌.

sentence.Network_en: Riptide is a strong underwater current.
sentence.Network_cn: 激潮是海面下一种强大的暗流.

list.abs: a riptide is very narrow . so just a few strokes in the right direction and you'll be out of danger .激潮的范围很窄，所以只要朝正确方向游几下，那么你就能脱离险境了。

entry.tran: 裂流区(两股水流交汇处或海水极深处)
entry.def: A riptide is an area of sea where two different currents meet or where the water is extremely deep. Riptides make the water very rough and dangerous.

means.word_mean: 1. a stretch of turbulent water in a river or the sea caused by one current flowing into or across another current
2. a strong surface current flowing outwards from a shore
